title: AWS re:Invent 2025 -From Agentic AI Demos to ROI: Path to Production With Confluent, Anthropic & AWS
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从智能体AI演示到投资回报率:与Confluent、Anthropic和AWS的生产之路
abstract: Most enterprises are stuck in AI pilot purgatory—impressive demos, no ROI. Garther predicts that by 2028 80% of successful GenAI apps will run on existing data platforms, yet many still treat AI as “magic” exempt from existing data challenges. This session shows why batch pipelines kill model value and how Confluent’s data streaming platform and Streaming Agents, AWS Bedrock, Amazon SageMaker, and MCP Servers unlock scalable multi-agents systems that monitor business events and instantly act or trigger real-time automation. Leave with practical frameworks to cut through hype and build AI architectures that drive measurable revenue and tangible business outcomes. This presentation is brought to you by Confluent, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 大多数企业陷入了AI试点困境——演示效果惊艳，却没有投资回报率。Gartner预测到2028年，80%成功的生成式AI应用将运行在现有数据平台上，然而许多企业仍将AI视为不受现有数据挑战约束的"魔法"。本次会议展示了为什么批处理管道会削弱模型价值，以及Confluent的数据流平台和流式代理、AWS Bedrock、Amazon SageMaker和MCP服务器如何解锁可扩展的多代理系统，监控业务事件并即时采取行动或触发实时自动化。您将获得实用框架，帮助您突破炒作，构建能够推动可衡量收入和切实业务成果的AI架构。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴Confluent提供。

presenter.name: Sean Falconer
presenter.title: Sr. Director of Product, AI Strategy
